short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that visualises audio from a user selected tab. THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A universal music visualiser for Google Chrome TM

Visual allows you to visualise audio from any tab. It’s easy to use and an exciting way to bring life to audio from sites such as YouTube, Spotify, or anywhere else you can think of!

What makes Visual unique is that it visualises audio in a new tab, which you can then put anywhere you like such as on a projector or a second monitor. With the popup menu, you can change the tab you want to stream from, the visualiser and its settings without interruption in real-time.

By Jay McKerracher & Naveed Gujral

How to use:

1. Select the tab you want to visualise with the “select tab” button in the footer bar of the pop up menu
2. Click Visualise in the popup menu
3. A new tab will be created where your visualiser will be displayed, click visualise inside the tab

This extension is currently in open beta and is being released for user testing. 
If there are any issues please email us at jmngdev@gmail.com.
